<!DOCTYPE html>

  .image-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
    gap: 20px;
  }

  .image {
    max-width: 80%;
    height: auto;
    border-radius: 150px;
  }
</style>
</head>
<body>

</html>
